description: This file contains CSS styles for theming and layout for the App component of a Tic-Tac-Toe frontend. It defines light and dark theme colors, layout styles, animations, and media queries for responsive design.

classes.name: App
classes.description: Main application container with centralized text alignment and theme-based background color.

classes.name: App-header
classes.description: Header section of the application with flexbox layout for centering content.

classes.name: App-logo
classes.description: Logo element providing styling for size and animation.

classes.name: App-link
classes.description: Styling for links within the application using theme colors.

classes.name: theme-toggle
classes.description: Button element for toggling themes, with various interactive styles.
